alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 7:26PM EDT until July 04 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Sampson County in central North Carolina... East central Cumberland County in central North Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Jerome, or 15 miles west of Clinton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Roseboro, Salemburg and Autryville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
